Detailed Description

template<typename _T, const unsigned int kMaxStates, const unsigned int kMaxEvents>
class UStateMachine< _T, kMaxStates, kMaxEvents >

Purpose: To provide state driven event based callbacks.

File: UStateMachine.h Author: Kevin Bray Created: 04-12-06 Copyright © 2004 Bootstrap Studios. All rights reserved. class UStateMachine
